prompt_used: Photorealistic selfie, single adult, front-facing, eyes to camera, full head and shoulders fully visible with small margin around hairline and chin, subject centered, portrait orientation, face occupies ~4060% of frame, even soft lighting, plain light-gray background, no hats, masks, sunglasses, hands, or hair covering the face. Apply: Close-up of a face with several darker brown patches (melasma or post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation), uneven skin tone, natural lighting.
